title: SSP SlideShowPro Director 1.2.11 {mdc}
description:
<a href="http://slideshowpro.net/products/slideshowpro_director/slideshowpro_director" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://slideshowpro.net/products/slideshowpro_director/slideshowpro_director</a>

For Mac + Windows.

............................................................................

SlideShowPro Director is a server-side content management and image publishing system for both SlideShowPro for Flash and SlideShowPro for Lightroom. The application is installed either on your own web server or hosted by us as part of a subscription package. The software allows you to upload both images and video, organize them into albums and/or galleries (which are simply collections of albums), assign image metadata like captions, titles, and hyperlinks, and retrieve web-optimized slideshow content for multiple slideshows. 

............................................................................

if you want to install ssp director without having an activation key, just go to "ssp_directorappcontrollerscomponentspigeon.php" and replace line 100
"return (preg_match('/^(127.0.0.1|localhost)(:d+)?$/i', $this->baseDomain())) ? true : false;", with "return (preg_match('/^(127.0.0.1|localhost)(:d+)?$/i', $this->baseDomain())) ? true : true;"
now the activation key is unrequired!!!
